name: Eternity: The Last Unicorn
description: Classic RPG, with lore based on Norse mythology. Travel through mesmerizing locations, meet fantasy characters and fight to protect Elven immortality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows® 7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 660 GTX+ or AMD Radeon HD 7870+ DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 14 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: Additional: Microsoft Xbox 360® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is strongly recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows® 7/8/10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: Additional: Microsoft Xbox 360® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) is strongly recommended
